text: Looks like you left out the unit — px em rem % etc.
Hello <@UQWGKUEN7>, I have already set the unit from the field but that is the main problem, the unit is not reflecting here on preview.
Ahhh the unit element in a field is only for the content editors so they have some frame of reference. You still need to set it when you in-line the style

<span class="percent"  style="font-family: {{ module.counter_font.font }}; {{ module.counter_font.style }}; color: {{ module.counter_font.color }}; font-size: {{ module.counter_font.size }}{{module.counter_font.size_unit }};">{{ item.counter_number }}</span>
I have used like this and set the unit px bydefault but then also it not considering that unit
Yea you need to just hard set it to px or whatever that unit is. That unit only displays in the page editor.
In other words don’t use .size_unit at all to set the unit value of the style. Just use it to give context to the content team when they are setting values in the page editor
oky <@UQWGKUEN7>, I will do this. thanku
